channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Admin UI Customize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Admin UI Customize

item.title: CVE-2022-3824|2024-08-03T01:20:58.448Z -- unknown -- wp%20admin%20ui%20customize
item.description: The WP Admin UI Customize WordPress plugin before 1.5.13 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
